text:
"He's in cheerful spirits."

Michael Gove says Boris Johnson is "recovering well" from #coronavirus, and spoke with Dominic Raab on Friday to deliver instructions to the government. He adds the PM is "absolutely on top of things."
 
#COVID: https://t.co/GM5u37D7JW #Ridge https://t.co/DGEA4GzQZf
